lead_paragraph: Defending champions Czech Republic will bid for a third straight Fed Cup final appearance in April without the firepower of its top players Petra Kvitova and Lucie Safarova.

headline.print_headline: Czechs to Meet Swiss in Fed Cup Semi Without Kvitova, Safarova
headline.main: Czechs to Meet Swiss in Fed Cup Semi Without Kvitova, Safarova

snippet: Defending champions Czech Republic will bid for a third straight Fed Cup final appearance in April without the firepower of its top players Petra Kvitova and Lucie Safarova....
